title: Seeker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, reveal to the Cult who any town member with a day ability will be targeting tonight. This is revealed at the start of the night. You have 2 uses of this ability.
- At night, determine a player’s sub-alignment. You have 3 uses of this ability.
- At night, discover who a player targets and who targets them. You have 2 uses of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This role is converted from Town Investigative members.

desc:
Post 964
*You peer through Corax’s eye. You see all there is to see. But your power is frail, weak. Use it to protect the stories of your gods.*

You may only perform one ability per phase.
